translation.en: ♪ Super Monsters Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们是超能小萌怪 白天是人类

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们是超能小萌怪 晚上就变身

translation.en: ♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ Here with my friends ♪
translation.zh: ‎和朋友们一起 ‎剧名：月光旋律

translation.en: ♪ Working together we have fun Come give a hand ♪
translation.zh: ‎一起努力 享受乐趣 ‎互相帮助

translation.en: ♪ That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ Working together We're Super Monsters, here we come ♪
translation.zh: ‎一起努力 ‎我们是超能小萌怪 我们来了

translation.en: ♪ Growing together, we work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起成长 ‎我们一起努力一起玩
‎这样才能把事情做完

translation.en: ♪ Done, done, done, done, done ♪
translation.zh:
‎我们一起努力一起玩
‎这样才能把事情做完

translation.en: That was great! Everyone was on key and we remembered all the words!
translation.zh: ‎唱得真棒 ‎大家都没跑调 也没忘词

translation.en: Now I just have to remember the dance steps.
Don't worry, Frankie. You've got this.
translation.zh: ‎别担心 弗兰奇 你可以的

translation.en: Victoria definitely agrees with you.
Victoria, your music is going to make this the best Blue Moon celebration ever.
translation.zh:
‎维多利亚 有了你的音乐
‎这次会是有史以来最棒的蓝月庆典

translation.en: [giggles] I like that.
Now that we've practiced our "Working Together" song,
it's time to work together and make the programs for our concert.
translation.zh:
‎是时候一起努力
‎制作演唱会的节目单了

translation.en: [Igor] That's an excellent plan, Lobo.
We definitely need programs for tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我们的确需要今晚演出的节目单

translation.en: But first, there's something else we need to do.
translation.zh: ‎但现在我们有别的事情要做

translation.en: [Igor] Sun down!
[all] Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Zoe.
Frankie!
Cleo!
Spike!
Vida!
[all] Super Monsters!
I can't wait to sing for our parents tonight.
translation.zh: ‎我迫不及待想在晚上唱歌给家长听

translation.en: Every monster loves to celebrate the Blue Moon.
translation.zh: ‎所有的萌怪都喜欢庆祝蓝月

translation.en: Especially this monster! [howls]
[Zoe] I made a poster for the concert. What do you think?
translation.zh:
‎我做了演唱会海报
‎你们觉得怎么样？

translation.en: -[exclamations of approval] -Very good.
We should make the cover of our programs look like Zoe's poster.
translation.zh:
‎我们应该为节目单做张封面
‎就像佐伊的海报那样

translation.en: Great idea, Drac.
Magic wind, blow with care. Make the poster float on air.
translation.zh: ‎魔法风 轻轻吹 吹起海报飘上天

translation.en: ♪ Here with my friends ♪
♪ Working together we have fun Come give a hand ♪
translation.zh: ‎一起努力 享受乐趣 互相帮助

translation.en: ♪ That is the way we get things done ♪
♪ Working together, we're Super Monsters Here we come ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起努力
‎我们是超能小萌怪 我们来了

translation.en: ♪ Growing together, we work and play That's how we get things done ♪ ♪ Done, done, done, done, done ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起成长 我们一起努力一起玩
‎这样才能把事情做完

translation.en: Goodness. These programs look wonderful.
We put our pictures inside so the audience knows who's in the show.
translation.zh: ‎里面还有我们的照片 ‎这样观众就能知道都有谁参演

translation.en: [Igor] see that the programs also lists
all of the songs you're performing tonight.
translation.zh: ‎节目单里还列出了 ‎你们今晚要唱的歌

translation.en: Well done, kiddoes.
Perfect. We have a program for everyone who's coming tonight.
translation.zh: ‎好极了 今晚的来宾每人一张刚刚好

translation.en: I made one extra.
Come on, Molasses! Let's deliver it. Fast, fast, fast, fast.
translation.zh:
‎走吧 莫拉希斯
‎我们去送节目单 快点…

translation.en: [pants] Here Victoria. I made this just for you.
translation.zh: ‎维多利亚 这是我特意为你做的

translation.en: Thank you for helping us perform tonight. This is going to be fang-tastic!
translation.zh:
‎谢谢你今晚帮我们演奏
‎今晚的演出一定会万分出色

translation.en: You're right, Victoria.
We do need to practice the soapy song one more time. I'll go get everyone.
translation.zh: ‎的确需要再练一下泡泡歌 ‎我去叫大家过来

translation.en: ♪ Bring on the bubbles And monster-fun ♪
translation.zh: ‎抹上泡泡 萌怪们都爱这乐趣

translation.en: ♪ It's super soapy bath time For everyone ♪
translation.zh: ‎肥皂滑滑 大家一起来沐浴

translation.en: ♪ Monster size suds Is where we want to be ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们要沉浸在为萌怪打造的泡沫里

translation.en: ♪ It's splash time, laugh time Super-soapy bath time ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起玩水 一起欢笑
‎一起开心洗澡澡

translation.en: -♪ Super Monsters love to get... ♪ -[howls]
I guess I got a little carried away. Sorry. Victoria, can we start over?
translation.zh:
‎我激动过头了 抱歉
‎维多利亚 可以重新开始吗？

translation.en: -♪ Bring on the bubbles ♪ -[howls]
Lobo, do you feel OK?
I feel fine. But whenever I try to sing,
translation.zh:
‎-洛博 你没事吧？
‎-我没事 ‎但每当我想要唱歌 蓝月总是让我…

translation.en: the Blue Moon makes me howl. [howls]
translation.zh: ‎但每当我想要唱歌 蓝月总是让我…

translation.en: That didn't happen during the last Blue Moon.
translation.zh: ‎上次蓝月升起时没出现这样的情况啊

translation.en: Every Blue Moon is different.
That means that the blue moon's magic is different too.
translation.zh: ‎这意味着蓝月的魔法也各不相同

translation.en: Especially if you're werewolves.
Maybe if we could block its rays?
That's a great idea, Vida.
Uh... Mega-size!
Thanks, Frankie.
-♪ Bring on the bubbles ♪ -[howl]
It's no use. I can't control my howling when I sing!
translation.zh: ‎不管用 我一唱歌就想嚎叫

translation.en: Maybe you can't sing, but you can still dance.
translation.zh: ‎虽然没法唱歌 但你还可以跳舞

translation.en: You're right, Zoe. Drac, will you switch places with me?
translation.zh:
‎你说得对 佐伊
‎德拉克 可以和我换换吗？

translation.en: [Drac] Absolutely.
♪ Bring on the bubbles And monster-fun ♪
translation.zh: ‎抹上泡泡 萌怪们都爱这乐趣

translation.en: ♪ It's super soapy bath time For everyone ♪
translation.zh: ‎肥皂滑滑 大家一起来沐浴

translation.en: ♪ Monster sized suds Is where we want to be ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们要沉浸在为萌怪打造的泡沫里

translation.en: ♪ It's splash time, laugh time Super-soapy bath time ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起玩水 一起欢笑
‎一起开心洗澡澡

translation.en: Super Monsters! We have to...
[all] ...catch that bathtub!
Goodness.
I'm so sorry, everybody. This is all my fault.
translation.zh: ‎各位真抱歉 都是我的错

translation.en: Igor, Esmi... I don't think I can be in the show.
translation.zh:
‎伊格尔 爱丝米
‎我觉得我没法参加演出了

translation.en: Lobo, you can't go. This concert was your idea.
translation.zh:
‎-洛博 你不能走
‎-是你提出要开演唱会的

translation.en: You worked so hard helping us rehearse.
We've all worked hard to practice for tonight.
translation.zh: ‎为了今晚的演出 大家都很努力

translation.en: But if I stay, I'll ruin it for everybody.
translation.zh: ‎但我要是留下来会毁了整场演出

translation.en: You know what, Lobo? You and the other Super Monsters
translation.zh: ‎洛博 你和其他超能小萌怪

translation.en: are so good at finding solutions
translation.zh: ‎洛博 你和其他超能小萌怪 ‎都很擅长解决难题

translation.en: to difficult problems.
Maybe there's a solution to this problem too, if you try.
translation.zh:
‎眼下的难题没准也有解决的办法
‎只要你们…

translation.en: ♪ Working together ♪
We'd better do it fast. The audience will be here soon.
translation.zh: ‎那我们最好快一点 观众就快到了

translation.en: Come on, everybody. I have an idea.
Straight up and to the left.
Blue moonbeams are causing trouble. Bounce them away with a magic bubble.
translation.zh: ‎蓝月光 惹麻烦 魔法泡泡弹开它

translation.en: [all] We did it! Yay!
Oh, bats!
We're sorry, Lobo.
The blue moon's magic is just too strong.
Thanks for trying, you guys. But it's no use.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢你们努力想要帮我 但是没用的

translation.en: Maybe we should just have the concert tomorrow night.
translation.zh: ‎不如把演唱会推迟到明天晚上？

translation.en: Everyone's already on their way here.
If we don't do it tonight, it won't be a Blue Moon concert.
translation.zh: ‎要是今晚不唱 就不叫蓝月演唱会了

translation.en: I really love the Blue Moon.
I just wish its magic didn't ruin my singing.
translation.zh: ‎要是它的魔法不会影响我唱歌就好了

translation.en: Maybe you can find a way to use its magic.
translation.zh: ‎也许可以想办法利用它的魔法

translation.en: I bet there's a song that would sound really good with werewolf howls.
translation.zh:
‎我敢打赌一定有一首歌
‎适合狼人嚎着唱

translation.en: Frankie, that's a great idea! I know the perfect song.
translation.zh:
‎弗兰奇 这主意真棒
‎我刚好知道一首歌

translation.en: This is my family songbook.
It's filled with all kinds of great stuff.
Including...this one!
What do you think, Victoria?
[all cheer] It's a great idea.
I'm really looking forward to this concert.
Me too! A Blue Moon, a magical organ,
translation.zh:
‎我也是 ‎蓝月 魔法管风琴
‎还有唱歌跳舞的小萌怪

translation.en: and little monsters singing and dancing! I can't wait.
translation.zh:
‎蓝月 魔法管风琴
‎还有唱歌跳舞的小萌怪 ‎我都等不及了

translation.en: Welcome everybody. And a happy Blue Moon to one and all!
translation.zh: ‎欢迎大家 祝大家蓝月快乐

translation.en: Tonight, we have something extra special for you.
translation.zh:
‎今晚我们为大家
‎准备了一场特别的演出

translation.en: -[all laugh] -Take it away, Victoria.
Jorge, where's Lobo?
♪ Sometimes a monster stubs their paw ♪
♪ Bumps their head or breaks a claw ♪
♪ Anytime you get a monster "ow" ♪ ♪ Ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You might get an "ow" on a wing ♪
♪ Accidents happen, it's no big thing ♪
♪ Anytime you get a monster ouch ♪ ♪ Ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ It's OK to say Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ Boo-boos happen to everyone ♪
♪ Something that's a little bit bad ♪
♪ It's something that's a whole Lot of monster fun ♪
♪ You fall when you jump Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You get an itty bitty bump Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You get bumped by a ball Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ You can't help it at all Ow, ow, ow ♪
♪ Anytime you get a monster ouch It's OK to say ♪
translation.zh: ‎每当小萌怪受伤 ‎嚎几声也没关系

translation.en: -[applause] -[cheers]
I never knew Lobo could howl like that. Jorge, you must be so proud.
translation.zh:
‎我不知道洛博还会这样嚎叫
‎乔治 你一定很为他骄傲

translation.en: Such a big set of pipes on such a little wolf boy!
It was wonderful!
Thank you, Luigi.
We could never have done it without everyone working together.
translation.zh:
‎没有大家一起努力
‎我们是不可能做到的

translation.en: [all] Sun up! Super Monsters!
Great job tonight, Lobo.
translation.zh: ‎今晚的演出很精彩 洛博

translation.en: You really made the concert a howling success!
Dad! Argh!
How about just one more?
Thanks, Victoria. That was fun.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 维多利亚 太好玩了

translation.en: It sure was.
Now... Who's ready to turn this dance party into a garden party?
translation.zh: ‎谁要把舞蹈派对变成植物园派对？

translation.en: A garden party?
Yes. A garden party is when we all work together
translation.zh: ‎植物园派对？ ‎植物园派对就是大家一起

translation.en: to take care of our night garden.
I can use my plant magic to help.
Well, Super Monsters, what are we waiting for?
translation.zh: ‎超能小萌怪 我们还等什么？

translation.en: Let's get the party started!
What's that, Victoria?
You have something you want to give to the Super Monsters?
translation.zh: ‎你有东西要交给超能小萌怪？

translation.en: Something for their garden?
Goodness. What could this be?
I can't wait to plant our snapdragon seeds.
translation.zh: ‎我等不及要种下金鱼草的种子了

translation.en: I can't wait to harvest some delicious green beans.
translation.zh: ‎我等不及收获美味的青豆了

translation.en: Kiddoes, you won't have to wait much longer.
translation.zh: ‎孩子们 你们用不着等太久

translation.en: [Igor] Sun down.
[all] Monsters up!
Drac!
Katya.
Lobo!
Zoe!
Frankie!
Cleo!
Spike!
Vida!
Super Monsters!
[Vida] Oh, it's beautiful!
It's going to be so fun to use my plant magic to help this garden grow.
translation.zh:
‎用我的植物魔法帮助植物生长
‎一定很好玩

translation.en: We all love using our monster powers in the night garden.
translation.zh:
‎我们都很喜欢
‎在夜间植物园使用超能力

translation.en: Come on and I'll show you.
We're going to have lots of green beans for snack time tonight.
But picking all these beans will take forever.
Let me help you.
Well, I guess we're done gardening.
translation.zh: ‎这下子植物园的工作全都做完了

translation.en: But I was having so much fun!
Spike, since we're done in the garden, maybe it's time to go...
translation.zh: ‎史派克 既然植物园的工作做完了 ‎那么是时候去…

translation.en: Dragon sailing!
I wonder what color these snapdragons will be?
translation.zh: ‎不知道这些金鱼草会是什么颜色的

translation.en: Guessing the colors is my favorite part.
Mine too. I can hardly wait. You don't have to wait.
translation.zh:
‎-我也是 我都等不及了
‎-其实不用等

translation.en: They're blue.
They sure are pretty.
And really snappy!
I didn't even have time to guess the colors.
I'm happy I could help.
Vida! Wait up!
Some water for you. And some for you.
translation.zh: ‎给你浇点水 ‎再给你浇点水 给你也来点

translation.en: And for you.
translation.zh: ‎再给你浇点水 给你也来点

translation.en: Wow, Drac! Did your vampire moves do that?
translation.zh:
‎天啊 德拉克
‎这是吸血鬼舞步的力量吗？

translation.en: That was me. I used my plant magic. You're welcome.
translation.zh: ‎是我 我用了植物魔法 不用谢

translation.en: Ah... Thank you?
Hi little guy.
I brought some things to help you grow. Big and strong. Like me!
translation.zh:
‎我给你带了些东西
‎能帮你长得又高又壮 就像我一样

translation.en: What are you doing, Frankie?
It can't stand up on its own yet.
You're tying it to those stakes so it won't fall over?
translation.zh: ‎你要把它绑在木桩上 防止它倒下？

translation.en: Got it! Oops.
I can help with that.
There. Now it doesn't need those stakes to hold it up.
translation.zh: ‎好了 现在它不需要木桩扶着了

translation.en: Wow. I kind of wanted to be the one to help it grow.
What else can I do to help?
I don't think there is anything else left to do.
We're done already? But I was having so much fun.
translation.zh: ‎这样就好了吗？可我玩得正开心

translation.en: I think gardening night is over.
I guess I'll go put these back.
Igor, I thought Super Monsters liked working in the garden.
translation.zh:
‎伊格尔 我以为超能小萌怪
‎喜欢在植物园里干活

translation.en: They certainly do.
So why does everyone seem so sad?
Well, Vida, part of the fun of having a night garden
translation.zh: ‎维达 夜间植物园的乐趣之一

translation.en: is sharing the work with others.
Each Monster gets to use their unique skills and powers
translation.zh:
‎每个小萌怪都可以
‎用自己独有的技能和超能力

translation.en: to help the garden grown.
Oh, no! I was having so much fun using my monster magic
translation.zh: ‎糟糕 ‎我光顾着自己开心地使用超能力

translation.en: that I didn't let anyone else use theirs.
translation.zh: ‎没能让其他人使用他们的超能力

translation.en: You guys, I'm really sorry.
I got so excited, I forgot to share.
translation.zh: ‎我兴奋过了头 忘记了分享

translation.en: It's OK, Vida. I get super excited about using my powers too.
translation.zh:
‎没关系 维达
‎我使用超能力时也很兴奋

translation.en: Me too. And me three. All the time.
We all do.
Next time we work in the garden, I promise I'll share with everyone.
translation.zh:
‎下次在植物园里工作时
‎我保证会和大家分享

translation.en: Super Monsters, I have a special seed that needs your help.
translation.zh:
‎超能小萌怪 这里有一颗特别的种子
‎需要你们帮忙培育

translation.en: Take a look.
-[all] Ah! -[all cheer]
Victoria asked me to give this to you.
translation.zh: ‎维多利亚让我把它交给你们

translation.en: She said it needs a special kind of monster magic to make it grow.
translation.zh:
‎她说只有特别的超能力
‎才能帮助它成长

translation.en: I've never seen anything like it. I wonder what it is?
translation.zh:
‎我从没见过这样的种子
‎不知道它会是什么

translation.en: But you know everything.
Actually, there are a lot of things I don't know!
translation.zh: ‎其实我不知道的事情有很多

translation.en: But that doesn't mean I can't learn.
I'll go check my books and see what I can find out.
translation.zh: ‎我去翻翻书 看看能不能查到什么

translation.en: I'll go ask Victoria
if there's anything else she can tell me about this seed.
translation.zh: ‎还有没有其他有关这颗种子的信息

translation.en: While I do that, why don't you try using your monster powers to get it to grow?
translation.zh:
‎你们就趁这段时间
‎用超能力让它生长吧？

translation.en: I can use my plant magic to... oh.
Maybe it's someone else's turn to use their powers?
translation.zh: ‎该轮到其他人使用超能力了

translation.en: It's monster magic time.
Shiny seed that brightly glows. Now it's time to see you grow!
translation.zh: ‎闪闪种子放光芒 让我看到你成长

translation.en: Oh. Let me try again.
Glowing seed so very small. Time to grow up big and tall.
translation.zh: ‎小小种子真闪耀 快快长大快长高

translation.en: If a witch's spell won't work, maybe it needs a little zombie power!
translation.zh:
‎女巫的咒语不管用
‎也许它需要的是僵尸能力

translation.en: Maybe it just needs a little water.
I've got it. Spike, do you know where Phoebe is?
translation.zh:
‎我知道了
‎史派克 你知道菲比在哪吗？

translation.en: Sure. She's over there playing in the trees. Why?
translation.zh: ‎当然 它在树上玩 怎么了？

translation.en: Some plants need sunlight to grow instead of moonlight.
translation.zh:
‎有些植物需要阳光才能生长
‎月光没有用

translation.en: Maybe Phoebe's sunlight can help.
translation.zh: ‎也许菲比的阳光能让它发芽

translation.en: Wow! You think of everything, Cleo.
translation.zh: ‎天啊 你可真聪明 克里奥

translation.en: Oh, Phoebe! Phoebe!
Phoebe, we need your help to grow this seed.
translation.zh:
‎菲比 我们需要你帮忙
‎让这颗种子发芽

translation.en: That is one stubborn seed.
Vida, you should try using your plant magic.
translation.zh: ‎维达 你应该试试你的植物魔法

translation.en: Are you sure? You and Drac haven't had a turn yet.
translation.zh: ‎你确定？你和德拉克还没试过呢

translation.en: My vampire moves are awesome,
but I don't think that's what this seed needs.
OK. I'll try.
Let me try again.
[Spike] This is awesome!
Even my moves have moves.
Mummy power! Time to fly.
Hey, Frankie. Do you want a lift?
translation.zh: ‎弗兰奇 要我载你一程吗？

translation.en: Thanks, Spike, but I've got this.
translation.zh: ‎谢谢 史派克 我可以的

translation.en: Mega size!
[Frankie] Oh, no! I broke it.
Poor little seed.
Now it can never grow in our night garden.
translation.zh: ‎它再也没法在夜间植物园里生长了

translation.en: I'm sorry. I ruined everything.
It's OK, Frankie. It was an accident.
translation.zh: ‎没关系 弗兰奇 这只是一个意外

translation.en: [gasp] Frankie, the seed isn't broken!
Vida's right. Look. It's growing!
translation.zh: ‎维达没有说错 看啊 它发芽了

translation.en: I found it. It's called the impossible seed
translation.zh: ‎我找到了 ‎它叫做“不可能的种子”

translation.en: because it's almost impossible to make it grow.
translation.zh: ‎因为它几乎不可能发芽长大

translation.en: This book says that this seed needs a witch's spell
translation.zh: ‎书上说种子需要女巫的咒语

translation.en: and a zombie's touch to make it grow.
This says the seed needs to be watered by a werewolf
translation.zh: ‎这本书上说种子需要狼人浇水

translation.en: and get sunlight in the nighttime.
Then the seed has to have a double dose of plant magic.
The last thing it needs is a monster stomp to crack it open.
I don't think any gardeners could do all that.
translation.zh: ‎没有哪个园丁能做到这一切

translation.en: It's beautiful.
Well done, Super Monsters!
You found a way to make the impossible seed grow.
translation.zh: ‎你们让不可能的种子长大了

translation.en: Victoria says she knew you could do it.
translation.zh: ‎维多利亚说 她就知道你们能做到

translation.en: Anything is possible when we all work together.
translation.zh: ‎只要齐心协力 一切皆有可能

translation.en: Sun up! Super Monsters!
♪ Growing together ♪ ♪ Work and play That's how we get things done ♪
translation.zh:
‎一起成长 我们一起努力一起玩
‎这样才能把事情做完

translation.en: ♪ La la la la la la Super Monsters ♪
♪ Super Monsters ♪
♪ We're Super Monsters We're human in the daylight ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们是超能小萌怪 白天是人类

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters We become monsters at night ♪
translation.zh: ‎我们是超能小萌怪 晚上就变身

translation.en: ♪ In Pitchfork Pines we learn And help each other grow ♪
translation.zh: ‎在幼儿园学习 互帮互助一起成长

translation.en: ♪ There's magic in twilight That's when we start to glow ♪
translation.zh: ‎借助暮光魔法 我们开始闪亮

translation.en: ♪ Sun down Monsters up! ♪
♪ I'm Drac, flying fast ♪
translation.zh:
‎-德拉克飞得快
‎-克里奥大旋风

translation.en: ♪ Cleo, wind power Spike, dragon clouds ♪
translation.zh:
‎-德拉克飞得快
‎-克里奥大旋风 ‎-史派克吹云朵
‎-佐伊透视眼

translation.en: ♪ Zoe, zombie vision Lobo, super speed ♪
translation.zh:
‎-史派克吹云朵
‎-佐伊透视眼 ‎-洛博飞毛腿
‎-卡蒂亚施魔法

translation.en: ♪ Katya, magic spells Frankie, stomp ♪
translation.zh:
‎-洛博飞毛腿
‎-卡蒂亚施魔法 ‎弗兰奇 踩

translation.en: ♪ We're Super Monsters Monsters ♪
